comments:
F2

Note: the stack and the fact that this does not happen on XP suggests this may
be fixed by the fix for 14463. Thus this should first be tested in a post F2 build.

1) Open a plugin.xml file and a .java file
2) Make sure the .java editor is active
3) Exit/Restart
4) Click on the plugin.xml editor tab
